hero.description: Imagine having a paralegal who never sleeps, knows all Brazilian, American, and Caribbean law, and creates asset structures in minutes.

features.title: Start simple, evolve at your own pace
features.subtitle: You don't need to change everything at once. Use POLARIS for your current needs
features.subtitle2: and discover new possibilities as you go.

feature1.title: Understanding Tax Law
feature1.description: As a senior attorney who has studied all Brazilian, American, and Caribbean legislation, I answer questions about income tax, social contribution on net profit, PIS/COFINS, and much more.

feature2.title: Create Documents on Your Own
feature2.description: Holdings, contracts, opinions... What used to take days is now ready in minutes. You just review and sign.

feature3.title: Always Up-to-Date
feature3.description: Directly connected to the Internal Revenue Service, the Securities and Exchange Commission of Brazil (CVM), and other agencies. Never again worry about whether the law changed yesterday.

statistics.title: The numbers speak for themselves
statistics.subtitle: Offices using POLARIS save time and make more money

integration.title: It works. Completely integrated into your daily routine.
integration.subtitle: It doesn't disrupt your workflow. POLARIS works in the background. You continue using your systems normally.

feature1.title: Connects with Everything
feature1.description: Your current systems continue to work

feature2.title: Smart Search
feature2.description: Find any document or law in seconds

feature3.title: 100% Secure
feature3.description: Your data stays protected and private

pricing.title: Start for free today.
pricing.subtitle: Whether for quick consultations, simple documents, or complex structures, we have the ideal plan for your office.

guarantees.title: Guarantees that Protect You
guarantees.subtitle: We assume all risks so you can test POLARIS with complete peace of mind.

guarantee1.title: 30 Days Unconditional Guarantee
guarantee1.description: If for any reason you are not 100% satisfied, we will refund all your money. No questions, no bureaucracy.

guarantee2.title: Lifetime Support Included
guarantee2.description: As long as you are our client, you will have access to our specialized support. No extra fees, no surprises.
